CIF.Text: CIF, 1996, c. 18 (assent: 20.06.96), Act in force on assent 20.06.96 except s. 10(9) of the Public Service Superannuation Act, as enacted by s. 25(3), in force on 01.01.1997 see s. 38(1); s. 40.3(1) of the Public Service Superannuation Act, as enacted by s. 33, in force 15.10.97see SI/97‑124; ss. 42 to 46 in force on the second Sunday after the day on which this Act receives royal assent see s. 47 see also various coming into force provisions throughout and Acts amended
